text: Petko Dermendzhiev (born 13 February 1936) is a Bulgarian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle welterweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Bulgaria Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Petko Dermendzhiev
